title: How It
description: Share content in four simple steps. No accounts, no complexity, just pure privacy.

steps.title: Create a Drop
steps.description: Upload text, code, or files. Everything is encrypted instantly on your device.

steps.title: Get Your Key
steps.description: Receive a unique drop key. Share it securely with your other device or recipient.

steps.title: Unlock & Access
steps.description: Enter the drop key on any device to decrypt and access your content.

steps.title: Auto-Delete
steps.description: Content expires after access or time limit. Zero trace left on our servers.
